body_html: Magma is not used to boost the performance. It's only that without it some linear algebra functions (linear system solvers, Cholesky decomposition, and similar) will not work. You won't find any difference unless you use those.
body_text: Magma is not used to boost the performance. It's only that without it some linear algebra functions (linear system solvers, Cholesky decomposition, and similar) will not work. You won't find any difference unless you use those.
body: Magma is not used to boost the performance. It's only that without it some linear algebra functions (linear system solvers, Cholesky decomposition, and similar) will not work. You won't find any difference unless you use those.
